question: Beni Prasad Verma, who recently passed away, was a founding member of which political party?
explanation:
One of the Founding members of the Samajwadi Party, Beni Prasad Verma passed away recently at the age of 80.
He had served as the Union Telecom Minister from 1996 to 1998 in the cabinet of then Prime Minister H D Deve Gowda. He has also been the Union Steel Minister. He was closely associated with the party leader Mulayam Singh Yadav.
